author: IGN
description:
Get ready for DIGY – Dope Indie Game of the Year! The Mix presents the newest award show showcasing your favorite titles Thursday (3/13) at Noon PT. Jump in on the fun Organized by a team of seasoned game industry and event production veterans, this new awards show focuses on indies, celebrating the games and the talented people behind the craft of game development.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dope Indie Game of the Year Awards 2025

author: IGN
title: You can get Invincible's Dupli-Kate for FREE by completing quests in Fortnite! #fortnite #invincible

author: IGN
description:
WIND BREAKER Season 2 will be streaming only on Crunchyroll starting April 3.

Anyone who causes pain, who brings destruction, who holds evil in their heart will be purged by Bofurin without exception! Where the average scores are the lowest, but the fights are the strongest. Furin High School is renowned as a super school of delinquents. Haruka Sakura, a first-year student, came from outside the city to fight to the top. However, Furin High School has become a group that protects the town called the “Chime of the Wind Breaker” – Bofurin. Forming connections with his friends and the townspeople, Sakura's idea of what it means to be "at the top" begins to change. He makes new friends and encounters new enemies. He fights to protect as he stands as Grade Captain, taking the heroic legend of this high school delinquent to the next stage!

WIND BREAKER Official Website:   https://windbreaker-anime.com/
WIND BREAKER Official X:   https://x.com/windbreakereng
WIND BREAKER Official Facebook
title: WIND BREAKER Season 2 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
A new Creed rises over Japan as justice is forged in the Shadows. Check out this Assassin's Creed Shadows cinematic trailer for the upcoming action RPG. Assassin's Creed Shadows will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, macOS, Amazon Luna, and PC (Steam) on March 20, 2025.

In Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you will live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover their common destiny as they usher in a new era for Japan.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Launch Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Halo Infinite Operation: Blue Team launch trailer for the latest addition to the first-person shooter franchise developed by Halo Studios. Players can experience a new Operation for the game bringing Firefight Classic, Hot Swap, and a new 20-tier Operation Pass to unlock rewards. The Operation: Blue Team event is live now until April 8 for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Halo #HaloInfinite #Gaming
title: Halo Infinite - Official Operation: Blue Team Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Shadow Project in this announcement trailer for the upcoming cinematic, story-driven tactical FPS set in the Cold War. Sent to the heart of the Soviet Union, word has spread of developments regarding unethical experiments. Shadow Project will be available on PC (Steam) in 2025.

Shadow Project takes place during the heightened tensions of the Cold War between the Soviet Union and the United States. Your goal is simple, but achieving it will not be. You must infiltrate Soviet territory and put a stop to their recently discovered experiments, which have subjected all forms of life to a series of torturous and inhuman trials.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Shadow Project - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's another look at ANTRO in this trailer for the upcoming 2.5D platformer game that blends fast-paced action, puzzle-solving, and parkour. Antro is set in a dystopian future where humanity is forced underground. Antro will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S. A demo is out now.
title: Antro - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Face perilous magical trials in the fast-paced rogue-lite follow-up to the acclaimed original, featuring co-op and vibrant new 3D visuals. Master new Arcana and elements, experiment with spell combinations, and become the next Wizard of Legend!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Wizard of Legend 2 - Humble Games Showcase 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Lilo & Stitch, the live-action version of the classic series Lilo & Stitch distributed by Walt Disney Studios. 

Stitch goes on an out-of-this-world adventure after a daring escape from a galactic space station that takes him to Earth. Lilo and Stitch become acquainted as Stitch not only learns the customs and traditions of life on Earth, but also the core values of family.

Lilo & Stitch stars Chris Sanders, Maia Kealoha, Sydney Agudong, Courtney B. Vance, Zach Galifianakis, and more. Lilo & Stitch is directed by Dean Fleischer Camp and written by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright, Dean DeBlois, and Chris Sanders.

Lilo & Stitch releases in theaters on May 23.

#LiloAndStitch #Disney #IGN
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official Trailer (2025) Chris Sanders, Maia Kealoha, Sydney Agudong

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PUBG: Battlegrounds Anniversary update trailer for the free-to-play battle royale shooter developed by PUBG Studio. Players can enjoy a suite of updates to the game to celebrate the game's milestone including festive decorations across a variety of maps, new Special Drop Missions, key improvements to Arcade mode, gunplay balance adjustments, and more. PUBG: Battlegrounds is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, and PC.

#PUBG #PUBGBattlegrounds #Gaming
title: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Official 8th Anniversary Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the final trailer for Pixar Animation Studios' original series, Win or Lose. All episodes of Win or Lose are now available on Disney+.

Pixar Animation Studios’ original series “Win or Lose” follows the intertwined stories of eight different characters as they each prepare for their big championship softball game. The series reveals what it actually feels like to be in the shoes of each character—the insecure kids, their helicopter parents, even a lovesick umpire—with incredibly funny, very emotional and uniquely animated perspectives.

#WinOrLose #Disney #TV
title: Win or Lose - Official Final Trailer (2025) Will Forte

author: IGN
description:
Watch the The First Berserker: Khazan Rovelion trailer for the hack-and-slash action-adventure RPG developed by Neople. Players will be able to explore and fight through the Rovelion Imperial Theater, once the home of arts and culture in the Pell Los Empire. Be ready for Hallucinations that lie within the art of Rovelion in The First Berserker: Khazan, launching on March 27 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#TheFirstBerserker #Gaming #Games
title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Official Rovelion Trailer

author: IGN
description: Introducing Fracture Point, a fast-paced FPS that blends roguelike with looter-shooter mechanics. Players must fight through procedurally generated floors of a corporate skyscraper, battling security forces, mercenaries, and bosses while scavenging gear and trading loot at the base to enhance their character. Set in a realistic dystopian metropolis engulfed in a war between a powerful corporation and the resistance, the game delivers an intense and immersive experience. It reminds us a bit of Criterion's classic PS2-era first-person shooter Black. Wishlist Fracture Point on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3560110/Fracture_Point/
title: Fracture Point - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Monster Hunter Wilds has already made a huge impact on the market, but not all of that is positive. With high end consoles in the PS5 Pro and even higher end PCs, the game can be a monster to tame. In our Monster Hunter Wilds IGN Performance review, we look at the graphics quality, performance issues across PS5, PS5 Pro, PC, Xbox Series X|S. How it scales, the best settings, and even the best place to play.

Chapters

0:00 Introduction

0:32 Moving to RE Engine, Technical settings, image quality and aims

3:32 The pros and cons of using the RE Engine

4:49 Art design, textures, and scalability

6:31 High Quality texture pack boosts and cost

12:52 Optimal PC Settings & performance - Low/Medium range

13:37 Optimal PC Settings & performance - High/Enthusiast range

14:37 PS5 Pro vs PS5 - Performance and settings

16:23 PS5 vs Xbox Series X - Performance and settings

18:22 Xbox Series S - Performance and settings

19:46 Summary
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - PS5 Pro vs PS5 vs PC vs Xbox Series X|S Performance Review

author: IGN
description:
Capcom was on its knees after Resident Evil 6, now Monster Hunter Wilds is cementing its golden era - here's how it did it! Monster Hunter Wilds has recently broken records on Steam and the Resident Evil game series is more popular than ever thanks to RE Village and a handful of stellar remakes including Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil 2. It’s almost as if Capcom is incapable of failure... but that wasn’t always the case. 

Less than a decade ago, following a bunch of critical and commercial flops, Capcom had lost its way and its audience. It was suffering from an identity crisis. Resident Evil, which established the survival horror genre, had lost its bite after RE4. Street Fighter was on the ropes after the poorly-received launch of Street Fighter 5. It could easily have been the critical end of Capcom and its much-loved video games. But a change in the way Capcom made its games, supported by its powerful new RE Engine, gave these much-loved games series a new lease of life. This
title: Capcom Was on Its Knees After Resident Evil 6

description: Odin: Valhalla Rising will be available on PC and mobile in 2025, with pre-registration open starting April 3, 2025. Watch the Odin: Valhalla Rising teaser trailer for a peek at this open-world MMORPG based on the worldview and history of Nordic mythology.
title: Odin: Valhalla Rising - Official Teaser Trailer
